Room.Name: Rest Area
Room.ShortDescription: This is the field workers rest area. A single giant oak tree grows here.
Room.LongDescription: A small stream pools here, providing a reflecting surface for the tree branches above. A lone picnic table stands in the middle of the area. Someone has wedged a wine keg in the lower boughs of the tree, and it seems to have a good amount still in it. Perhaps this would be a good place for a nap after a nip.
